name: Engineering Guidelines Repository
description: Central repository containing Salsify engineering guidelines, best practices, and recommendations. Published to the Engineering Portal and represents the 'happy path' of development. Includes guidelines for microservices, ADRs, Avro, feature flags, logging, database migrations, and more. Owned by all of engineering.

name: Architecture Decision Record
description: Short markdown documents that detail architectural decisions at Salsify. ADRs capture context, decisions, consequences, and alternatives considered. Stored in GitHub using the pull request process. Filenames are prefixed with date in YYYY-MM-DD format. ADRs are immutable once merged; changes require amendments.

name: ADR Repository
description: GitHub repository where Salsify tracks Architecture Decision Records. Contains ADRs organized by area/domain with a README linking to all ADRs. Includes templates for creating new ADRs.

name: Rails Template - Microservice Scaffolding
description: Salsify's standardized Ruby on Rails application template for creating new microservices. Includes health checks, CircleCI configuration, Avro schema generation, and other Salsify best practices. Optionally generates a schemas_gem directory for sharing Avro schemas.

name: Salsify Kafka Library
description: Ruby library for working with Apache Kafka at Salsify. Provides the Actor Framework for processing Kafka events with ordered execution, batching, and deduplication. Used for asynchronous communication between services with Avro-encoded messages.

name: Kafka Actor Framework
description: Framework within salsify_kafka for processing Kafka events. Provides ordered execution (FIFO for same-key events), batching, best-effort deduplication, and integrated telemetry. Requires Redis and PostgreSQL. Recommended for inter-service asynchronous work triggered by Kafka events.

name: Avro Builder - Schema DSL
description: Ruby gem providing a DSL for defining Apache Avro schemas. Addresses JSON schema deficiencies with less verbose syntax, file sharing between projects, and simplified field handling. Generates .avsc files from .rb DSL files.

name: Salsify Avro - Common Types
description: Ruby gem containing avro-builder DSL files for common schemas used across Salsify projects. Includes salsify_uuid, timestamp, multitenant_value, uniquely_identifiable_value, and request_value types. All types defined under com.salsify namespace.

name: Avromatic - Avro Model Classes
description: Ruby gem for defining model classes with attributes from Avro JSON schemas. Generated models serialize/deserialize to Avro, support validation, and work with key/value schema pairs for Kafka messages.

name: Avro Schema Registry
description: Rails application that stores Avro schema versions. Reimplements the Confluent Schema Registry API using PostgreSQL instead of Kafka for storage. Supports fingerprint-based schema lookup with CloudFront caching for high availability.

name: Avrolution - Schema Compatibility
description: Ruby gem for checking Avro schema compatibility during test runs and registering new schemas during deployment. Uses avro_compatibility_breaks.txt for exceptions. Integrated with CircleCI and Jenkins deployment pipelines.

name: Salsify Grape - REST API Framework
description: Ruby gem providing Salsify-specific extensions for Grape REST APIs. Includes JWT authentication, request logging, metrics reporting, and exception handling integrations.

name: Salsify GraphQL Server
description: Ruby gem providing a thin layer on top of graphql-ruby for developing GraphQL servers following Salsify conventions and best practices. Includes JWT authentication and data lake metrics reporting.

name: Salsify GraphQL Client (Ruby)
description: Ruby gem providing a thin layer on top of graphql-client for invoking GraphQL APIs following Salsify conventions and best practices.

name: Salsify Organizations - Feature Flag Replication
description: Ruby gem providing framework for replicating feature flags and organization data from Dandelion to other Ruby services. Provides ActiveRecord model access for checking if features are enabled for organizations.

name: Salsify Request Logger
description: Rack middleware for request logging in Ruby services. Propagates X-REQUEST-ID header for cross-application tracing.

name: Salsify Logger - Structured Logging
description: Ruby gem for structured JSON logging at Salsify. Supports thread-local and block-scope metadata with add_fields and with_fields interfaces. Recommended for all application logging.

name: Service Security - JWT Authentication
description: Ruby gem for securing inter-service communication. Handles JWT token generation via Dandelion's /api/internal/token endpoint and request header propagation.

name: Auto Scaler - Background Worker Scaling
description: Ruby gem for auto-scaling background workers. Recommended for scaling Delayed::Job workers. Non-production environments should scale workers to 0 when idle to save costs.

name: Delayed Job Extensions
description: Salsify-specific extensions to Delayed::Job providing queue fairness, job limits, user/organization execution context, metrics reporting, and exception handling integrations.

name: Delayed Job Pump - Scalable Job Processing
description: Enhancement to Delayed::Job addressing SQL backend scalability concerns. Uses Redis in addition to PostgreSQL for faster job scheduling while maintaining transactional guarantees. Provides improved OOM error handling.

name: Metrics Reporter - New Relic Integration
description: Ruby gem for sending metrics to New Relic. Provides helpers for custom events with proper naming conventions (camelized words with colon-separated namespaces).

name: Exception Reporter - Bugsnag Integration
description: Ruby gem for reporting exceptions to Bugsnag with proper attributes including organization, user, superuser, and service information.

name: Health Checks Library
description: Ruby gem for implementing /health_check HTTP endpoints in microservices. Supports data_stores and services scopes with token authentication for deep checks.

name: Salsify UUID - Entity Identifiers
description: Library for Salsify's 38-byte UUID format used as identifiers for entities exposed from services. Also an Avro fixed field type in salsify_avro.

name: Email Service Client
description: Ruby gem for sending emails via the Email Service. Encapsulates Postmark integration so credentials can be easily rotated and providers swapped.

name: API Gateway
description: Routes all incoming external traffic to Salsify services. Provides path-based routing on app.salsify.com, superuser authentication for admin UIs, and abstracts internal service details from callers.

name: JSON Web Token - Service Authentication
description: Self-contained, cryptographically signed tokens used for securing REST API communication between services. Generated via Dandelion's /api/internal/token endpoint. Contains user, superuser, and organization information.

name: Personally Identifiable Information
description: Sensitive personal data that should not be logged, stored indefinitely, or included in Avro references. Includes user emails and external IDs. Subject to scrubbing on request.

name: TechDocs - Technical Documentation
description: MkDocs-based documentation hosting on the Engineering Portal. Used for publishing internal documentation from repository docs folders. Served via techdocs-cli for local preview.

name: Engineering Portal - Internal Developer Portal
description: Internal Salsify portal at engineering.internal.salsify.com providing documentation, software catalog, and developer resources. Hosts TechDocs and component information.

name: Software Catalog Repository
description: GitHub repository tracking all Salsify software assets as Component definitions. Components have lifecycle states: experimental, active, deprecated, and decommissioned.

name: Build Images - CI/CD Docker Images
description: Salsify's project containing Docker images for CircleCI builds. Preferred over legacy circleci/* images.

name: Artifactory - Package Repository
description: Salsify's internal package repository at repo.internal.salsify.com for hosting RubyGems and NPM packages. Used for sharing internal libraries between projects.

name: Developer Experience Team
description: Team maintaining Jenkins, CI/CD pipelines, and centralized automation at Salsify. Reached via #team-infrastructure Slack channel.

name: Inbox-Outbox Pattern - Inter-Service File Sharing
description: Pattern for asynchronous inter-service file sharing using S3 buckets with inbox/ and outbox/ prefixes. Secondary services have write-once access to inbox, primary service writes to outbox. Used when Kafka events are insufficient for data size/format.

name: Batched Operation
description: Ruby gem for handling batched asynchronous operations with custom solutions for specific use cases beyond Delayed::Job and Kafka actors.

name: Kube Prometheus - AlertManager Configuration
description: Repository for configuring Kubernetes AlertManager alerts. Routes alerts to team Slack channels or PagerDuty based on severity.

name: ActiveRecord Extensions
description: Ruby gem providing Salsify-specific ActiveRecord extensions including health check connectivity tests for PostgreSQL.

name: CRUD Events - Entity Lifecycle Events
description: Pattern for Kafka events representing Create, Update, Destroy operations on entities. Uses separate schemas (e.g., entity_created_event_value, entity_updated_event_value, entity_destroyed_event_value) published to a shared topic for ordering.

name: Salsify UUID
description: Salsify's 38-byte fixed field UUID format used as external identifiers for entities. Used in logging fields like organization_id, publication_id, user_id, and superuser_id.

name: Advance Platform Editions
description: Salsify platform edition feature flags: salsify_legacy, advance_core, advance_enterprise, and advance_enterprise_plus. Used purely for UI display of platform edition, not for enabling/disabling features.

name: Product Decision Record
description: Documentation for product decisions including entitlement-related feature flags. Reviewed by Support and shared in #pdrs Slack channel.

name: Technical Solution Design
description: Engineering-focused document capturing technical decisions including feature flags for incremental release and operational controls. Shared in #eng-docs Slack channel.

name: Deploy Rails Service Pipeline
description: Jenkins shared library pipeline for deploying Ruby on Rails services. Supports registerAvroSchemas option for automatic schema registration during deploys.

name: @salsify/graphql-client - JavaScript GraphQL Client
description: Salsify-idiomatic GraphQL client for JavaScript UI clients. Provides consistent API interaction patterns for frontend applications.

name: @salsify/graphql-type-generator - TypeScript Generator
description: Tool for generating TypeScript declarations from GraphQL operation documents. Provides end-to-end type safety for frontend GraphQL usage.

name: Product Detail Page
description: Key Salsify feature powered by GraphQL. The page displaying detailed product information to users.

name: Salsify Base URL Environment Variable
description: Cluster-wide environment variable containing the URL users visit for the deployment (e.g., https://app.salsify.com/ for production). Used for building callback URLs safe for all environments.

name: Ephemeral Test Environment
description: Temporary isolated environment for testing at Salsify with unique URLs like https://harmless-rotunda-4242.test.salsify.com/. Separate from staging and production.

name: Out of Memory Error
description: Memory exhaustion errors in background jobs. Delayed::Job cannot detect OOM crashes by default, leading to indefinite retries. Delayed::JobPump provides improved OOM handling.

name: Strong Migrations - Safe Database Changes
description: Ruby gem referenced for understanding database migration safety. Helps identify potentially dangerous schema changes on large tables.
